heroDesc: I love working at the intersection of Product and Technology on industry disrupting solutions

interests.desc1: I'm an active developer and investor in Blockchain and Web3 technologies that I believe will become new standards in the future. I've been testing some ETH smart contracts using the Solidity language and just recently migrated this website onto the ICP blockchain! To try and stay up to date sometimes I kick the tires with test/educational projects such as the following Node.js blockchain on Github.
interests.desc2: In more recent years I have contributed to lots of frontend web, cloud, and mobile projects including this site (see code) using wonderful libraries such as React.js and Next.js. While I have lots of experience working and managing the fullstack across my career (including REST APIs and gaming consoles) I especially enjoy coding up UIs and front-ends these days.
interests.desc3: I've been learning more about the underlying code and technologies used to create nerual networks and large language models and wrote a recent blog covering how to run an LLM on your local development machine using Node.js. I find the opportunities and possibilities with generative-AI to be almost un-imaginable and strongly believe these technologies will have a major impact on the world in many different ways.
interests.desc4: While still in their infancy I find zkProofs to be quite a fascinating advancement when it comes to security and privacy. The idea that a user can verify they have certain data or know a particular truth - without revealing any info about that actual truth - is mind-boggling to me. I believe this presents great new opportunities for authentication and verification, both on- and off-chain.
interests.desc5: When I'm not coding up the next revolutionary product I'm still a gamer at my core. Games like FC24, Fortnite, and even StarCraft 2 (Battle.net: NavyYeti) are still heavy in my rotation. I also enjoy classic board games and traditionals such as chess and backgammon.
